name: Limbo (itch) (Muzman123)
description:
A silent hill PT-inspired horror game (without the hallway loop thingy :p).

after a lot of procrastination and busy days, this game was made in around a week.

You are stuck in Limbo. Explore your setting and find a way to get out of the exit door, but be careful because you are not alone...

Feedback is highly appreciated :)

Controls

WASD to walk

E to interact with doors

Hold LEFT SHIFT to run

--GAME TIPS--

  • -if you feel stuck, walk to places you haven't been to before to trigger an event. 
  • Explore and keep listening for sounds (very crucial)
